message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I believe would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. The product sounds interesting, but my budget is a bit tighter. Would you consider selling it to me for $10000?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I believe the value of this product justifies a higher price. I'm willing to come down to $12500. What do you say?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I believe the value of this product justifies a higher price. I'm willing to come down to $12500. What do you say?
Thanks Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. I'm still looking to save as much as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11750? This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11750? This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Alice, thanks again for the offer. I'm still trying to get the best possible deal. I'll offer $11500. That's my final offer.
Thanks for your final offer, Bob. I accept your offer of $11500. It's a pleasure doing business with you!
